params.blockNumber: The block number to get the checkpoint for

lastCheckpointedBlock().details: Be aware that the last checkpointed block may not be up to date, it is recommended      to always call `checkpoint()` before using getter functions

returns._0: The block number of the last checkpoint

latestCheckpoint().details: Be aware that the latest checkpoint may not be up to date, it is recommended      to always call `checkpoint()` before using getter functions

checkpoints(uint64).notice: Get a checkpoint at a block number

lastCheckpointedBlock().notice: Get the number of the last checkpointed block

latestCheckpoint().notice: Get the latest checkpoint at the last checkpointed block
